Task: Organising Committee of MOM DataBuds (1-year term).

Volunteer to host sharing, training, hackathon on data analytics topic. E.g. MOM DataBuds session, MOM Data Lab workshop. Duration of session must be more than 1-hour (inclusive of activities); content creation can be co-shared up to 2 pax. 2000 points will be awarded per session & pax.

Attend sharing session or training session on data analytics topic organised by MOM. E.g. MOM DataBuds sessions, MOM Data Lab workshop, MOM Tableau Brown Bag sessions. To validate participation, participant must complete feedback form for the initiative. 1000 points will be awarded per session.

Active Contributor in MOM Data Community MS Team - Contribute an article read or video watched on data analytics related topics (include 1-2 lines of key takeways in the post) in "Bytes of Knowledge" channel or address the question/enquiry posted in "Ask-Me-Anything" channel each month (from Feb to Oct). 500 points will be awarded per post/completed action, limit to once per month.
Attend MOM DataViz Day 2023. To validate participation, participant must complete feedback form for the initiative.
Submit entry for Data Tournament organised by MOM e.g. 'MOMers Finding Insights 2023'

Complete Tableau tutorial (inclusive of homework) organised by MOM. 500 points will be awarded per tutorial. Contact person - Ho Wee Peng.
